Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm hit a walk-off infield single in the 11th inning to score Jon Berti and give the Yankees a 4-3 win.
Bobby Witt Jr. made a diving attempt to catch the ball but his throw home was off line, leading to the Yankees' win.
Luke Weaver pitched a strong outing in relief, striking out key Royals hitters to keep the game tied.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone, the Yankees' manager, praised the team's performance and highlighted the importance of the win in the AL East race.
